subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour of California (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: With the world’s best sprinters taking center stage, Francesco Chicchi edged Mark Cavendish and J. J. Haedo in the 121.5-mile Stage 4 of the Tour of California.
snippet: With the world’s best sprinters taking center stage, Francesco Chicchi edged Mark Cavendish and J. J. Haedo in the 121.5-mile Stage 4 of the Tour of California.
